body_html:
Not a high priority. Am curious if there's a convention. This helps determine what dtype to use for the random variables we have in Edward: PointMass (here, it is Deterministic), Empirical, and DirichletProcess. https://github.com/blei-lab/edward/tree/master/edward/models

This also relates to the support specs on discrete vs continuous.

body:
Not a high priority. Am curious if there's a convention. This helps determine what dtype to use for the random variables we have in Edward: PointMass (here, it is Deterministic), Empirical, and DirichletProcess. https://github.com/blei-lab/edward/tree/master/edward/models

This also relates to the support specs on discrete vs continuous.
